# scar

Excessive PIE root *(s)ker “to cut” carve scar scrap scrape
Excessive PIE root *(s)ker- “turn” ⇔ circus “circle” and curvus “ curve ”.

𒍀 gur₅ •kerᵇ 𒋻 kud "cut"

𒊬 ŠAR šakar šahar •SCAR scribe! सब्ज़ sabz IE *sker- ‘cut’

𓆭 ⋍ 𓐬 script ⇔ (s)kreybʰ scratch ⇔ Schere ⇔ schnitt

𓋴 𓂋 𓈎 𓏏 𓆫 •sorqvioth skorpiós

𓆣 ج ر ب ʒ-r-b:jarab:scarab:scratch ج ر ح ʒ-r-h scar ج ر د ʒ-r-d scratch,scrap

𒍪𒋡𒆥𒁍 zu-qaʳqiʳpu scorpion σκορπιός skorpiós
𒀯 𒄈 𒋰 Zuqaqīpu Scorpio •S-GÍR-PU (sic!)

PIE *skrebʰ- “to engrave” < *(s)ker “to cut” scar
scrape > script scribō scribe > scrit scratch!
scrape > carve Kerbe PIE *gerbʰ- ⇔ craft engrave
